teacheasy.runtime

Class EditorRunTimeData

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.runtime.EditorRunTimeData

  • public class EditorRunTimeData
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the current state of the editor application and all its data. The methods in this class are called when events occur in the top level class which incorporates the GUI.
    Version:
    1.0 19 Apr 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructor method to create the editor run time data.

      • EditorRunTimeData

        public EditorRunTimeData(javafx.scene.Group nGroup,
                 javafx.geometry.Rectangle2D nBounds,
                 javafx.scene.layout.VBox propPaneBox,
                 TeachEasyClient nParent)
        Constructor method to create the editor run time data.
        Parameters:
        nGroup - The group the lessons are drawn on.
        nBounds - A rectangle that describes the size of the page area.
        propPaneBox - The container for the properties pane.
        nParent - The parent application that instantiated this instance.
